job.title: Software Engineer - Backend
job.description: pWere looking for a backend software engineer to help us build out a nextgeneration freight technology platform As an early engineer at Baton youd be given the opportunity to make an impact on a growing team and to own numerous mission critical backend services Our team isnt afraid to do what it takes to get the job done  whether thats hacking something together to quickly test a prototype hanging out at a warehouse all day to make sure we understand exactly what needs to be built or designing innovative solutions using technology to drive new business opportunities Were looking for people who move fast and are driven to make complex and inefficient systems work betterppbrppstrongWhy should you join usstrongppAt an early stage startup things move fast and youll have far more responsibility and opportunity for growth than at a larger company You will learn A lot Youll iterate through many careersworth of projects and solutions faster than you thought possible However you wont have to go it alone  at Baton youll have mentorship from accomplished senior engineers and work alongside an impressive team from the top universities and tech companies aroundppBaton httpswwwbatonio is a wellfunded startup backed by 8VC Maersk SV Angel Prologis and some of the most successful technology and freight entrepreneurs in the world See coverage here by Joe Lonsdale httpsrbgysegzm6 and here by FreightWaves httpsrbgyzpeo0ippWere trying to reimagine how goods are moved There is an enormous amount of waste in the backbone of the American economy httpsrbgybn9qvg and we have an opportunity to eliminate it Whether its finding ways to eliminate detention reduce empty driving miles 1 in 5 trucks on the road is empty improve working conditions for 35 million drivers or accelerate the adoption of electric vehicles we are on the cusp of a paradigm shift that will shape the future of the trucking industryppYou will have the opportunity to help architect this paradigm shiftppIf this resonates with you wed love to get to know you Please applyppbrppstrongYour rolestrong Software Engineer  Backend GeneralistpulliTake ownership of numerous backend services  from ML Optimization data pipelines to data model all the way up to the API layer to youll be the goto person when adding new featuresliliInvent and tinker Imagine completely new ideas experiment and build transformative solutions for the freight industryliliCollaborate with us Were a closeknit team with product engineering and operations all working together to build elegant products that improve drivers lives while reducing the massive inefficiencies in truckingliliGrow with the team We raised our Series A and are primed to grow our engineering team to tackle the challenges that come with scaling our business Youll get to experience the learnings and the growing pains that come with working at a startup trying to disrupt and transform an industryliulpbrppstrongWhere you livestrong San Francisco Bay Area or willingness to relocateppbrppstrongBasic Qualificationsstrongpulli2 years experience in software developmentliliBackend development experience with Python or other modern programming languagesliliComprehensive knowledge of modern web architecturesliliWillingness to learn new technologies and to own the backend for major product featuresliulpbrppstrongNice to havestrongpulliExperience with Tensorflow Google ORTools or related MLOptimization SDKsliliInterest in the freight and logistics spaceliul
